text: Puumala is a municipality in Southern Savonia, Finland. As of 28 February 2023, 2,111 people lived there. Neighbouring municipalities are Juva, Mikkeli, Ruokolahti, Savitaipale, Sulkava and Taipalsaari. It was founded in 1868. == Other websites == * Municipality of Puumala â€“ Official website Category:Municipalities of South Savo Category:1868 establishments in Finland
title: Puumala
